recommendations.small: Good for small Vanilla servers with up to 5 friends. Not recommended for mods.
recommendations.medium: Perfect for Vanilla with up to 10 friends, or lightweight modpacks (approx. 50 mods).
recommendations.standard: Great for standard modpacks (100+ mods) or Vanilla servers with 20+ players.
recommendations.heavy: Ideal for heavy modpacks (200+ mods) or larger communities (40+ players).
recommendations.very_heavy: Powerful performance for very heavy modpacks (300+ mods) or 60+ players.
recommendations.massive: Enterprise-grade power for massive networks, 100+ players, or the most demanding modpacks.

faq.title: How does billing work?
faq.answer: Spawnly uses a credit-based system. You purchase credits (1 Credit ≈ €0.01), and we deduct them from your balance every minute your server is <1>Running</1>. If you <3>Stop</3> your server, billing pauses immediately, but your files are kept safe for free.
